item.description:
Event: This is another visit to the Arboretum but it is for Lilac Sunday and that is a special day at Arboretum. The day includes touring the lilacs, dance performances and picnicking. Bring a picnic lunch or buy refreshments. For more information on the Park including directions go to: www.arboretum.harvard.edu

Trip's Coordinator: Andrea
RSVP: Required by May 6th use the email addr above and include a cell number for contact. Andrea will provide more details on the arrangements when you RSVP.
MEET: 11:00am at the Arborway Gate. There is limited parking on the side streets. The easiest way to get there is to take the Orange Line to Forest Hills and the Arboretum is just across the street from the Station. Rain Cancels
Cost: $5.00 if your not a paid member of Mosaic plus the cost of the food and refreshments
item.how_to_find_us: Rsvp to get more details and make connections with the trip's coordinator.
item.why: This is another trip to Arnold Arboretum but for a special event and is full of lots of performances and great picnic sites.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Lilac Sunday
